gate.creole.ontology.ocat

Class OntologyViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.gui.docview.AbstractDocumentView
          • gate.creole.ontology.ocat.OntologyViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ontology.OntologyModificationListener, gate.event.AnnotationListener, gate.event.AnnotationSetListener, gate.event.CreoleListener, gate.gui.ActionsPublisher, gate.gui.docview.DocumentView, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, gate.VisualResource, Serializable, EventListener

    public class OntologyViewer
extends gate.gui.docview.AbstractDocumentView
implements gate.event.CreoleListener, gate.event.AnnotationSetListener, gate.event.AnnotationListener, gate.creole.ontology.OntologyModificationListener
    In this class we implement the basic structure of the ontology viewer Which includes the total ontologies that has been loaded in the system option for the new ontology, if someone wishes to load it into the system the ontology viewer (which displays all the conetps) Ontology instance viewer and the instance attribute viewer
    Author:
    niraj
    See Also:
